summary:
Contact: mathias.moeller@sfc.com | +31 612187382
Setting goals together with determination and a lot of effort make a great mixture of success .
I am an experienced negotiator in business to business and have a strong drive within the sales and management area. My first nature is to maintain my positive vibe and draw this positive energy to everyone around me. I naturally take the lead in creating this exciting environment to make sure the team spirit is giving us that extra mile. Having experience within sales and project management on many levels, has made that I recognise opportunities more easily and I therefore use this knowledge to the teams benefit. I see myself succeed in (project) management, as a leader and in an advisory position within an international environment where I can unlimited develop myself.

What I usually hear when people are asked about who I am and what I do?

"Mathias is an enthusiastic, confident and decisive professional" 
"His energy is very contagious and makes you want to step in" 
"Because of his background he has a lot of knowledge of the manufacturing environment and therefore can easily recognise and weigh risks. Also due to his market knowledge"
"Mathias has a pro-active attitude which helps him master new projects quickly"
"He is an entrepreneurial type who is not afraid to make decisions"

projects.title: Casher's Aviation
projects.description:
Beginning in 1940, Cashers Inc. revolutionized the way paints and painting supplies have been distributed to the central Pennsylvania area.  The goal was simple- give the customers a quality product at a fair price.  But at Cashers we did not stop there.  We put service at the forefront.  Starting with professional personalized service, we work with our clients to make the most of the products you purchase from us.  Starting in 2006, we expanded our relationship with Axalta to include the new Axalta Aviation product line.  In the years since, we have expanded our service area to include the whole North East and Mid-Atlantic area.

Axalta offers a complete line of coatings for premium completion and refinish of aircraft .  These high performance products provide outstanding results that you would expect from Axalta and Cashers.

projects.title: Electron Energy Corp.
projects.description:
Electron Energy Corporation (EEC) is an expert developer and leading producer of rare earth magnets. With approximately 130 employees today, EEC is positioned as a significant American rare earth magnet producer with customers throughout the world.

Founded in 1970, we are headquartered in Landisville, PA.  We occupy 40,000 SF of office and manufacturing space in a building designed and constructed in 1985 specifically for the production of rare earth permanent magnets and magnetic systems. We have significantly expanded capacity with the opening of our second manufacturing facility in August of 2012. The additional 44,800 sq ft, located at 300 Running Pump Road in Lancaster, PA, more than doubles EEC floor space and enables us to improve efficiency and meet the growing demand for EEC products and services. The building will house the finishing operations—machining, testing, magnetizing, packing and shipping. The new facility will also enable EEC to expand production of complex and larger magnet assemblies.

Our talented staff continually exceeds expectations of customers, including military and aerospace prime contractors, as well as medical and oil exploration companies. We provide magnets and magnet assemblies for demanding applications such as the JSF, F-18, Patriot, Predator, and Navy nuclear programs. Our customization and ability to precisely control material compositions allow us to partner with our customers as a virtual ‘in-house’ source of magnet technology.

contributors.headline: Making it quick and easy to get your data to where it needs to be 📈

projects.title: Jack Manufacturing
projects.description:
Jack Manufacturing was founded to deliver the industrial grade products our customers love, direct to end users with exceptional customer service and easy ordering. Jack is wholly owned subsidiary of GM Industrial, a well established and highly diversified chemical manufacturer in Bedford, Ohio. 

Our Products

For over 40 years, we have been manufacturing chemicals for dozens of industries and applications including automotive, lubricants, janitorial supplies, cleaning solutions, disinfectants, sanitation, degreasers and cleaners for the food services industry, metal-working formulations, hand cleaners, personal care products, and more. 

Convenience

Through Jack Manufacturing we offer our most successful products direct to the end user with easy ordering and fast shipping. Unlike most e-commerce sites that sell too many, often low quality products, we concentrate on our best-in-show products that are time-tested by our loyal customers all over the country and offer them at unbeatable values. 

Experience

Our labs specialize in custom formulations that solve specific problems for our customers. Through the years our research and development has improved and expanded our offerings into a diversified catalog of the industry's best chemical and personal care products. 

Concentrated Magic

Magic Hand Cleaner is embraced all over the country by auto garages, janitorial workers, manufacturing facilities, and more. For those that work with their hands there is no replacement for the feeling Magic leaves your hands with.

projects.title: SJE Rhombus
projects.description:
SJE-Rhombus® provides smart solutions to today’s growing environmental challenges. We combine our 35 years of expertise in pump controls with the latest technology to deliver energy efficient, cost-effective products for a wide variety of residential, commercial, municipal, industrial and agricultural applications. 

SJE-Rhombus is a leading manufacturer of reliable, trouble-free liquid level controls for the water, wastewater and sewage industries throughout the United States and Canada, as well as into global markets.

company.name: SFC Energy Power Supply Solutions, Coils & Linear Drives

profile_positions.company: SFC Energy Power Supply Solutions, Coils & Linear Drives
profile_positions.title: Managing Director

profile_positions.company: SFC Energy Power Supply Solutions, Coils & Linear Drives
profile_positions.description:
SFC develops and produces reliable coils & linear drives with the highest standards of quality. The products are used for electron microscope lenses or deflection coils, for example. SFC’s R&D team works in close cooperation with our customers in order to ensure the designed product is feasible for manufacturing and to optimise its quality, price and performance.
Visit our website for more info, also about our Power division: https://www.sfc-power.com/
profile_positions.title: Division Manager Coils & Linear Drives

profile_positions.description:
Protecting People

TenCate focuses on the growing demand for protection of people and their living and working environments. The worldwide trends towards ‘safety and protection’ and ‘sustainability and the environment’ serve as the focal points of the protective solutions which TenCate provides. The four market themes are In transit, In habitats, At work and During leisure.
profile_positions.title: End User Expert - Benelux, Scandinavia, Baltics & UK

profile_positions.description: As an International Business Development Manager / Commercial Project Manager I am responsible for the sales activities of US based clients who want to expand their business in Europe. To expand their business I can concentrate on setting up a distributor’s network throughout Europe or focus on acquisition on OEM’s depending on how the business of the client is set up. New Clients will get an introduction program in which I will scan the European market and determine what possibilities there are. After this program and with a potential market I will expand the business and act as the European based sales office of the client.
profile_positions.title: International Business Development I Commercial Project Manager

Next to this, responsible for marketing activities at PBF Group B.V. 
Also always searching for new opportunities to expand business.
profile_positions.title: International Key Account Manager

profile_positions.company: SFC Energy Power Supply Solutions, Coils & Linear Drives
profile_positions.description:
PBF is a worldwide operating company, located in Almelo (the Netherlands), Cluj-Napoca (Romania) and Shenzen (China), specialised in switched-mode power supplies and higher level power solutions. PBF develops, manufactures and markets these
power solutions, which can range from power supply units to power systems, to top-level manufacturers of professional machines and equipment.
